TopicTitle: Forget Interplanetary launchpads - This changes everything

Articles.Content: um....... that is one way of returning...

Aand here I'm having struggle to achieve a proper lunar orbit in RSS... Also it would be a nice response/example to that person who was saying RSS is boring because it kills creativity in sake of realism That's an amazing work!

Wow, very impressive. I installed 6.4x for a few hours just to see the difference, and holy crap it's a helluva difference.

How much dV did that thing have at launch?

And here I was thinking my probe flyby of the moon was impressive! XD

RSS is amazing. And people that do missions in RSS are insane.
Looks like a wobble master to me!  lol.. best way to build those large transports is to have rockets in the front pull it, rather than push.  keeps it MUCH more under control!
